Amazing game, Piss poor anticheat. if you think Buying Prime will get you away from cheaters, think again. you just upgraded from the free cheaters to the premium cheaters. if you go more than 2 games without a cheater then you are truly blessed.
If you dont care about cheaters and fancy the challenge, definately pick this game up. otherwise stay the hell away.

The games okay. If you're laid back and don't really care about how well/bad you play like myself, then sure pick it up. Just bare in mind that 99% of the community are a bunch of brain-dead monkeys and you'll be fine. The game is STILL swarming with cheaters as well as toxic individuals to the point where trying to play it competitively is pretty pointless and will just drive you mad. All the game is to me anymore is preparation for the release of Valorant. I rate it 3/10 freshness
